summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Si.Na.Fi Ricorsi management system. Fixed 2 critical bugs: MongoDB ObjectId serialization on /api/admin/list and /api/admin/invites, and missing FileText import in PublicRicorsoPage.js. All core features working: admin login, dashboard, ricorso CRUD, delete functionality, public submission form.

fixed_during_testing.issue: MongoDB ObjectId not excluded causing 500 error
MongoDB ObjectId not excluded causing 500 error
FileText icon not imported from lucide-react causing page crash

critical_code_review_comments: Consider adding data-testid attributes to key interactive elements for better test coverage
Create ricorso form requires at least one campo dati - this is working as expected validation
seed_data_creation: Default admin and ricorso created on startup via server.py startup_event
context_for_next_testing_agent: All P0 issues from previous report resolved. Admin login, dashboard, delete ricorso, create ricorso, and public submission form all working. MOCKED: Admin invite system generates links instead of sending emails.

mocked_apis.POST /api/admin/invite: Generates invite link to copy manually instead of sending email

features_tested.admin_dashboard: PASS - displays ricorsi with statistics, modifica, elimina buttons
features_tested.delete_ricorso: PASS - delete button works, shows success toast, refreshes list
features_tested.create_ricorso: PASS - form loads with validation requiring at least one campo dati
features_tested.public_homepage: PASS - displays active ricorsi with PARTECIPA AL RICORSO buttons
features_tested.public_submission_form: PASS - form fields load correctly with file upload capability
